title: Server Opening Checklist
items: Clock in and check shift notes
Review specials and 86’d items with manager

title: During Shift Standards Checklist
items: Offer another round before drinks are empty

title: Server Closing Checklist
items: Get manager approval before clocking out

title: Host Opening Checklist
items: Clock in and review shift notes
Confirm sections and server assignments with MOD
Set up host stand (menus, iPad/clipboard, pens)
Confirm high chairs, boosters, accessibility needs
Confirm patio / outdoor seating status (if applicable)

title: During Shift Host Standards
items: Keep host stand clean and organized
No phone use at the host stand

title: Host Closing Checklist
items: Communicate issues or notes to MOD
Confirm dining room reset if needed
Get MOD approval before clocking out

title: Bartender Opening Checklist
items: Clock in and review shift notes
Set up bar top (wipe, sanitize, organize)
Stock ice wells and backup ice
Restock liquor, beer, wine, and mixers
Check glassware levels and polish as needed
Confirm specials, 86’d items, and feature cocktails with MOD

title: During Shift Bartender Standards
items: Acknowledge guests at the bar immediately
Maintain calm, professional energy during rushes
No phone use behind the bar

title: Bartender Closing Checklist
items: Break down and clean bar top and wells
Restock liquor, beer, wine, and mixers for next shift
Run checkout and close bar tabs
Get MOD approval before clocking out
